documentType: administrative detention order and prison records
summary: This document set consists of Bureau of Prisons administrative forms related to the placement of inmate 86993-054 (Jeffrey Epstein) into Administrative Detention/Special Housing Unit (SHU) at the New York Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in July 2019. The records include detention orders, inmate profile data, and psychological reviews, indicating Epstein was placed in protective custody pending a SIS investigation/threat assessment after he reportedly felt threatened on the unit.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The inmate who is the subject of all administrative detention orders and prison records, identified by register number 86993-054 and date of birth 03/10/1969. He was placed in the Special Housing Unit (Administrative Detention) at the New York MCC on 07-16-2019 for his own protection pending a SIS investigation/threat assessment.

persons.name: R. Proto

events.title: Epstein placed in Administrative Detention
events.description: Inmate Jeffrey Epstein was placed into the Special Housing Unit (Administrative Detention) at the New York MCC. The reason cited is 'PENDING SIS INVESTIGATION/ THREAT ASSESSMENT' and later notes 'COURTS SAY INMATE FELT THREATEN ON UNIT.'

events.title: Psychological SHU Review
events.description: A Psychology Services review found Epstein displayed no evidence of depression or suicidality, was adequately adjusting to SHU, and was psychologically stable with low threat to self and others.

events.title: 3-Day SHU Review
events.description: First formal review of Epstein's Special Housing Unit placement. The action taken was to continue him in the Special Housing Unit.

events.title: 7-Day SHU Review
events.description: In-person Special Housing Review. The action taken was to continue Epstein in the Special Housing Unit.

events.title: Weekly SHU Record Review
events.description: A weekly record review continued Epstein's placement in the Special Housing Unit. The next review was scheduled for 08-13-2019.

locations: NEW YORK MCC (New York Metropolitan Correctional Center)
Bronx, New York 10460 (listed as legal residence)
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein (Register No. 86993-054) was placed in Administrative Detention/Special Housing Unit at the New York MCC on July 16, 2019.
The stated reason for detention was 'PENDING SIS INVESTIGATION/ THREAT ASSESSMENT' with a later note adding 'COURTS SAY INMATE FELT THREATEN ON UNIT.'
A psychological review on July 18, 2019, assessed Epstein as psychologically stable with a low threat to self and others, and adequately adjusting to SHU.
Epstein's prison records show he was in pre-trial detention for charges under USC 846 and USC 841, was categorized as 'CARE1-MENTAL HEALTH', and had no prior disciplinary record at the MCC.
Administrative reviews on July 19, July 23, and weekly through August 6, 2019, consistently resulted in the decision to continue his placement in the Special Housing Unit.
